content: Hello! Could you please provide the conference name, year, and location, as well as any topics or interests you would like to focus on?

I would like to visit PyConDE in Darmstadt 2025. I am flexible and available all day long and do not have food preferences, but I would like to have lunch as close to the venue as possible at a place that has at least 4.5 stars on google. I am most interested in RAG topics at the conference.

Here is your personalized conference schedule for **PyCon DE & PyData 2025**, including all relevant sessions and RAG topics:

### Conference Venue
**Darmstadtium**  
**Address**: Schlossgraben 1, 64283 Darmstadt, Germany

### April 23, 2025
- **10:30** | Zeiss Plenary (Spectrum) | **Keynote**  
  Reasonable AI
  
- **11:45** | Dynamicum | **PyData: Data Handling & Engineering**  
  Power up your Polars code with Polars extension  

- **12:25** | Europium2 | **PyData: Natural Language Processing & Audio (incl. Generative AI NLP)**  
  Building an Open Source RAG System for the United Nations Negotiations on Global Plastic Pollution  
  [Details](https://2025.pycon.de/talks/NF8UPF/)

- **14:30** | Dynamicum | **PyData: Machine Learning & Deep Learning & Statistics**  
  supplyseer: Computational Supply Chain with Python  

- **14:30** | Europium2 | **PyData: Natural Language Processing & Audio (incl. Generative AI NLP)**  
  Taking Control of LLM Outputs: An Introductory Journey into Logits  

- **15:10** | Europium2 | **PyData: Natural Language Processing & Audio (incl. Generative AI NLP)**  
  Beyond Basic Prompting: Supercharging Open Source LLMs with LMQL's Structured Generation  

- **16:10** | Dynamicum | **PyData: Machine Learning & Deep Learning & Statistics**    
  Conformal Prediction: uncertainty quantification to humanise models  

- **17:10** | Dynamicum | **PyData: Research Software Engineering**  
  Citation is Collaboration: Software Recognition in Research and Industry  

- **17:50** | Dynamicum | **PyData: Data Handling & Engineering**  
  Build a personalized Commute agent in Python with Hopsworks, LangGraph and LLM Function Calling  
 
### April 24, 2025
- **09:00** | Carbonium | **PyData: Embedded Systems & Robotics**  
  Mini-Pythonistas: Coding, Experimenting, and Exploring with Zümi!  
  
- **10:15** | Europium2 | **PyData: Machine Learning & Deep Learning & Statistics**  
  Blazing-Fast Python in Your Database: Unlocking Data Science at Scale with Exasol  

- **10:55** | Europium2 | **PyData: Machine Learning & Deep Learning & Statistics**  
  Scalable Python and SQL Data Engineering without Migraines  

- **11:35** | Europium2 | **PyData: Machine Learning & Deep Learning & Statistics**  
  Bias Meets Bayes: A Bayesian Perspective on Improving Model Fairness  

- **14:20** | Titanium3 | **PyData: Generative AI**  
  Lessons learned in bringing a RAG chatbot with access to 50k+ Documents  
  [Details](https://2025.pycon.de/talks/XLZQFA/)

- **14:20** | Palladium | **PyData: Generative AI**  
  Securing RAG Pipelines with Fine Grained Authorization  
  [Details](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iBg-t99bVi4)

- **14:20** | Europium2 | **PyCon: Programming & Software Engineering**  
  Oh my license! - Achieving order by automation in the license chaos of your dependencies  

- **16:15** | Europium2 | **PyCon: MLOps & DevOps**  
  Building a Self-Hosted MLOps Platform with Kubernetes  

### April 25, 2025
- **09:05** | Zeiss Plenary (Spectrum) | **Keynote**  
  The Future of AI: Building the Most Impactful Technology Together  

- **10:15** | Platinum3 | **PyData: Generative AI**  
  Enhancing RAG with Fast GraphRAG and InstructLab  
  [Details](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qm1rlhkQ2Zk)

- **10:15** | Titanium3 | **PyCon: Testing**  
  From Queries to Confidence: Ensuring SQL Reliability with Python  

- **11:35** | Titanium3 | **PyCon: Programming & Software Engineering**  
  Rustifying Python: A Practical Guide to Achieving High Performance While Maintaining Observability  

- **13:20** | Platinum3 | **PyData: Natural Language Processing & Audio (incl. Generative AI NLP)**  
  Building a HybridRAG Document Question-Answering System  
  [Details](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W3AjbakJYsU)

### Recommended Lunch Spots
1. **Lava Restaurant**  
   - Address: Luisenpl. 5  
   - Rating: 4.7 (205 reviews)  
   - [Website](https://lavarestaurant-darmstadt.de/)

2. **ChefET Grill - Kebap & More Darmstadt**  
   - Address: Kirchstraße 18  
   - Rating: 4.9 (785 reviews)  
   - [Website](http://www.chefet-darmstadt.de/)

3. **Restaurant Sitte**  
   - Address: Karlstraße 15  
   - Rating: 4.6 (4000 reviews)  
   - [Website](https://www.restaurant-sitte.de/)

4. **Sultan Restaurant**  
   - Address: Bismarckstraße 9  
   - Rating: 4.7 (70 reviews)  

5. **Restaurant Harouns - Darmstadt**  
   - Address: Friedenspl. 6  
   - Rating: 4.6 (836 reviews)  
   - [Website](https://www.harouns.de/)  

Feel free to explore each session for more details and enjoy your experience at PyCon DE 2025!
